verses.content: Chun, vân thar le hnuoi thar ka hmuh a; vân hmasa le hnuoi hmasa chu a bohmang tah a, tuisuoriet khawm a um ta naw a nih.
Chun, khaw inthieng Jerusalem thar chu, mo a pasal ela ân chei angin inzosa hieuin, Pathien kuoma vâna inthawka hung ṭum ka hmu bawk a.

Chun, lalṭhungphaa inthawkin rawl inring tak ka hriet a, “Ngai ta, Pathien bâwkte chu mihriem lai a hung um tah, Ama chu an kuomah um a ta, Anni chu a mihai nîng an ta, Pathien ngei chu an kuomah um a ta, An Pathien ni bawk a tih;
An mita inthawkin mitthli po po hrufai a ta; Thina um nâwk ta naw nih a, Lungngai dâm, ṭap dâm, nat dâm khawm, Um nâwk ta bawk naw nih a; Thil hmasahai chu a bo tah,” tiin.
Chun, lalṭhungphaa ṭhung chun, “Ngai ta, thil iengkim ka siem thar ie,” a ta. Chun, “Ziek rawh, hieng thu hi ring a umin â n dik sih a,” a ti bawk a.
Chun, ka kuomah, “A hung tlung tah. Kei Alpha le Omega, a Bul le a Tâwp ka nih; dangchâr taphawt kuoma chun Hringna Tuikhura in- thawkin a thlâwnin pêng ka tih.
Hnetu taphawt chun chuong chu hluong an tih, kei an Pathien nîng ka ta, anni chu ka nauhai nîng an tih.

Amiruokchu, mi dawi dâm, awi- naw dâm, tirdakum dâm, tuolthat dâm, indit hmang dâm, dawithiem dâm, milim bie dâm, khêlinhlip po po dâm chan ding chu mei le kâta kâng dîla chun um a tih; chu chu thi hnina chu a nih,” a ta.
Chun, berbu pasari, hremna nuhnungtak pasaria sip chawi, vântirko pasari laia pakhat chu a hung a; ama chun, “Hung ta, mo, Berâmte nuhmei chu inentir ka ti che,” tiin a mi biek a.
Chun, ama chun Thlarauin tlâng lientak insângtakah a mifepui a, Jerusalem khaw inthieng chu, Pathien kuoma vâna inthawka hung ṭum a mîn entir a.
Pathien ropuina a nei a, a varzie chu lung mantamtak ang, jaspi lung ang el hi a na, krustal lung angin a tle a nih.

Kul nasatak insângtak a nei a, kawtkhâr sâwm le pahni a nei a, kawtkhâr bulahai chun vântirko sâwm le pahni an um a, chuong kawt- khâra chun hming ziek a um bawk a, chuong chu Israel thlahai hnam sâwm le pahnihai hming chu a nih;
saktieng pangah kawtkhâr pa- thum, hmârtieng pangah kawtkhâr pathum, simtieng pangah kawtkhâr pathum, thlangtieng pangah kawt- khâr pathum a um a.
Chun, chu khaw kul chun lung- phûm sâwm le pahni a nei a, chuonga chun Berâmte tirko sâwm le pahnihai hming a chuong a.
Chun, a mi betu chun, khuo le kawtkhârhai le a kul chu inkhina dingin rângkachak luong a chawi a.
Khuo chu inbiel vêlin a um a, a dungtieng chu a khangtieng chen a nih; khuo chu luong chun ân khih a, fîng sîng khat le sâng hni a nih. A dungtieng le a khangtieng le ân sângtieng chu ân ang a nih.
Chun, a kul chu ân khi nâwk a, mihriem inkhi dân pangngaiin (chu chu vântirko inkhi dân pângngai chu a nih) tawng za khat sâwmli pali a nih.
Chun, a kul chu jaspi lunga siem a nih, khuo chu hlimen inthieng ang ela, rângkachak inthienga siem a nih.

Chu khaw kul lungphûmhai chu lung mantam chi tinrênga chei- mawi a nih. Lungphûm hmasatak chu jaspi lung a na; a pahnina chu sapphir lung a na, a pathumna chu kalkidon lung a na; a palina chu smaragdin lung a na,

a pangana chu sardonuk lung a na, a parukna chu sardion lung a na, a pasarina chu kruso lung a na; a parietna chu birul lung a na, a pakuona chu topaz lung a na; a sâwm- na chu krusopra lung a na; a sâwm- pakhatna chu ngên lung a na; a sâwm- pahnina chu amethusto lung a nih.

Chun, kawtkhâr sâwm le pahni chu tuikeplung sâwm le pahni a nih a, kawtkhâr po po chu tuikeplung pa- khat senga siem a nih; chun, chu khaw kawtthlêr chu rângkachak inthieng a nih, hlimen entlang thei ang el hi.
Chun, a sûnga chun biekin hrim ka hmu nawh a; Lalpa Pathien Iengkimthawthei le Berâmte chu an biekin an ni sih a.
Chu khuo chun a ên dingin nisa a ngai nawh a, thla khawm a ngai bawk nawh; Pathien ropuina chun a ên a, an khâwnvar chu Berâmte a ni sih a.
A vara chun hnam tin um an ta, hnuoia lalhai chun an ropuina la lût an tih.
A kawthai chu sûnah khâr naw tawp an ta, chutaka chun zân hrim a um naw ding a ni sih a.
A sûnga chun hnam tin ropuina le chawimawina la lût an tih.
Nisienlakhawm, thil inthieng- naw hrim lût dêr naw nih a, thil tirdakum thawhai le khêlinhlip khawm lût naw bawk an tih; Berâmte Hringna Bua hming an ziekhai chau lût an tih.
